messages.message:
Hi Team,

It’s time to retire a few of the older build machines which are idle and unused. This will save us around $2000/month.

Wanted to check if anyone uses the following instances for running any scripts, as a proxy server, or uses them for testing purposes.

```
GCP Project - instabase-build

build-machine-v17-09-26 (https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-central1-b/instances/build-machine-v17-09-26?project=instabase-build).              [107.178.215.253]
build-machine-v18-10-22 (https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-central1-b/instances/build-machine-v18-10-22?project=instabase-build)               [35.232.185.148]
build-machine-v19-08-22-wil (https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-central1-a/instances/build-machine-v19-08-22-will?project=instabase-build)l.       [35.194.56.92]
build-machine-v19-10-09-will (https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-central1-a/instances/build-machine-v19-10-09-will?project=instabase-build)        [34.69.128.146]
client (https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-central1-a/instances/client?project=instabase-build)                                                  [104.154.177.168]
clone-build-machine-v17-09-26 (https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-central1-a/instances/clone-build-machine-v17-09-26?project=instabase-build)     [35.238.85.111]
```

Please let me know if you use any of these instances I’m happy to help you in migrating your use-case to the newer build machines.

I’ll stop these instances next week on March 30th.
could you please leave clone-build for a bit longer?
i still use the v20-04-22 one. Not taking that one down right?
No, it’s an active build machine.
can we get n2 instead of n1 machine-type instances? (https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/machine-types#machine_type_comparison)
3 new build machines are already type N2 and the future ones will also be of type N2
I'll need to migrate to newer ones
